id: Tortilla soup with chipotle chilli, tomato and avocado (Sopa Azteca)
ingredients: 2 chipotles en adobo (available from specialist stores, some supermarkets and online)
500ml/1lb 2oz corn or vegetable oil, for deep frying
1 avocado, stone and skin removed, diced into 1cm/½in cubes
small handful fresh coriander, roughly chopped
2 unwaxed lemons, juice and zest only
4 mild red chillies, seeds removed and chopped
2 red birds’-eye chillies, seeds removed and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
150ml/5fl oz water, chicken stock or red wine
1-5 red chillies (as hot as you dare!)
25ml/1 fl oz white or red wine vinegar
1-2 tbsp Tabasco (again as hot as you dare!)
1 tsp caster sugar (or a squidge of honey)
2 lemons, cut into wedges, to serve

id: Superfood salad with a piri-piri dressing
ingredients: 2 x 250–300g/7–10½oz pork shoulder steaks, ideally Secreto Ibérico
2 tbsp fresh oregano, leaves removed and finely chopped
1 tbsp sherry or red wine vinegar
6 large red peppers, seeds removed and cut into strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper
150g/5½oz plain flour, sifted, plus extra for dusting
2 red chillies, seeds removed, roughly chopped
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
12 very large prawns, shells removed but tails left on, cleaned
1 tsp baharat spice mix (available from Middle Eastern stores and some supermarkets)
½ lemon, whole peeled rind only
25g/1oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
4 free-range egg yolks, plus 1 whole free-range egg
vanilla seeds from one vanilla pod
1 vanilla pod, split, seeds scraped out
1.5 litres/2 pints 13fl oz good vegetable or chicken stock
salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
large bunch of greens or cabbage
smoked paprika and olive oil, for dressing
900g/2lb oily fish like mackerel, swordfish or tuna
900g/2lb white fish like sea bass, monkfish, hake or haddock
150g/5¼oz spicy chorizo, skin removed and cut into chunks
125g/4½oz thinly sliced Serrano ham, finely chopped
¾ tsp freshly ground black pepper
3 large potatoes, peeled, very finely julienned
½ red pepper, seeds removed, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper

id: Trout with mussel and chorizo salsa
ingredients: 2 trout fillets, pin-boned and skin on
salt and freshly ground black pepper

id: Sage-stuffed lamb chops with Serrano ham and sage pasta
ingredients: 550g/1lb 4oz '00' strong flour, plus extra for dusting
12 sage leaves, 3 leaves cut into quarters, the remainder left whole
salt and freshly ground black pepper

id: Iberian pork jowl with squid salad
ingredients: 4 black or red tomatoes, cut into thin wedges
½ shallot, peeled and thinly sliced
2 medium squid, cleaned, cut and scored
2 tbsp Moscatel or white wine vinegar
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ bunch chervil, finely chopped, to garnish
2 small boneless, skinless chicken breasts (each about 150g/5½oz), sliced
1 yellow pepper, seeds removed, cut into 4cm/1½in pieces
1 courgette, trimmed, halved lengthways and cut into 1cm/½in slices
400g tin butter beans, drained and rinsed
chopped fresh flatleaf parsley, to garnish
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
500g/1lb 2oz mixed mushrooms, larger ones halved or sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
small bunch parsley or coriander, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 tbsp finely chopped parsley leaves, to serve
800g/1lb 12oz floury potatoes, peeled and cut int 3–4cm chunks
2 tbsp finely chopped parsley, to garnish (optional)
3 tbsp very finely chopped parsley leaves
generous pinch dried red chilli flakes
1 large onion, thinly sliced into crescent moons
salt and freshly ground black pepper
500g/1lb 2oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for flouring and dusting
½ cucumber, peeled, deseeded and roughly chopped
1-2 tbsp sherry vinegar or white wine vinegar
24 seedless green grapes, peeled and halved
2–2.5kg/4lb 8oz–5lb 8oz boned pork shoulder, rolled, skin scored
1 tsp dried thyme (or 1 tbsp finely chopped fresh thyme)
1 tsp dried oregano (or 1 tbsp finely chopped fresh oregano)
1 tbsp red wine or sherry vinegar
100ml/3½fl oz white wine or Fino sherry
500g/1lb 2oz large waxy potatoes (such as Charlotte), thinly sliced (around 3mm/⅛in)
2 roasted red peppers (from a jar), cut into strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper

id: Nasi goreng with lime and sugar barbecued chicken
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz skinned boneless chicken thighs, each cut into 2.5cm/1in strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper
5cm/2in piece cucumber, cut into quarters lengthways, sliced
8 spring onions, trimmed, thinly sliced on the diagonal
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ green pepper, cut into thin slices
50g/1¾oz baby corn, halved or cut into quarters, depending on size
juice of 1 lime, plus lime wedges to serve
handful finely chopped fresh coriander, to serve
1 x 200g packet thin rice noodles, cooked according to packet instructions, drained and rinsed in cold water

id: How to make Thai green curry with prawns
ingredients: thumb-sized piece fresh root ginger, grated
small bunch fresh coriander, stalks and leaves
2 tbsp Thai green curry paste (made above)
1 tbsp palm sugar, or caster sugar

id: Sri Lankan cod and crab curry with pickles and samosas
ingredients: 9 curry leaves, plus 6 leaves to garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 lime, cut into wedges, to serve
½ small cauliflower, cut into florets
1 tsp finely chopped fresh root ginger
salt and freshly ground black pepper

id: Thai pork and lemongrass stir fry
ingredients: 4 fresh turmeric pieces, peeled and sliced
1 small, dried, very hot chilli, soaked and finely chopped
2–3 Prik Kee Noo Suan chillies or other Thai red chillies
1 heaped tbsp julienned kaffir lime leaves
2 white turmeric pieces or snake beans, sliced

id: Thai noodles with cinnamon and prawns
ingredients: 3cm/1¼in piece fresh root ginger, peeled and cut into fine matchsticks
½ long or 1 short stick cinnamon, broken into shards
2–3 leafy stems from the top of 1 stick celery, stems cut into short lengths, leaves roughly chopped
1 tbsp ketjap manis (or 1 tbsp dark soy sauce mixed with 1 tbsp soft dark brown sugar)
10 raw peeled king prawns, thawed if frozen
80g/2¾oz mung bean (glass) noodles or rice vermicelli, soaked and drained as per packet instructions
1 level tbsp Thai massaman curry paste
2 chicken breasts, boneless, skin removed (150g/5½oz each), cut into bite-sized pieces
1 red chilli, seeds removed, thinly sliced
4 green bird's-eye chillies, seeds removed, chopped
12 hand-dived scallops, scallop removed and roe discarded
pinch palm or light soft brown sugar
250g/9oz cooked turkey meat, preferably breast, in long strips
5cm/2in piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated
2 red chillies, seeds removed (according to taste), finely chopped
1 tsp palm sugar or soft light brown sugar
1 large Chinese lettuce or cabbage, shredded
small bunch radishes, cut into matchsticks
1 red pepper, cut into thin strips
4 spring onions, halved lengthways and cut into thin strips
1 tbsp roasted, unsalted peanuts, lightly crushed

id: Asian-braised shin of beef with hot and sour shredded salad
ingredients: 5cm/2in piece fresh root ginger, peeled, sliced
250ml/9fl oz Chinese cooking wine (or dry sherry)
2 litres/3½ pints beef stock, preferably organic
3.5kg/7½lb beef shin, on the bone, cut by the butcher into thick slices (or 1kg/2¼lb beef shin off the bone, cut into large cubes)
1 long red chilli, seeds removed, cut into matchsticks
1 long green chilli, seeds removed, cut into matchsticks

id: Turkey salad with Chinese cabbage, beansprouts and Vietnamese mint
ingredients: ¼ tsp salt, or to taste
350g/12¼oz cold, cooked leftover turkey meat, sliced into strips
400g/14¼oz Chinese cabbage, core removed, leaves finely shredded
1 large carrot, peeled, cut in half, finely shredded
15g/½oz Vietnamese mint leaves (available from some Asian grocers), or a mixture of coriander and mint or Thai sweet basil leaves, roughly chopped
40g/1½oz roasted peanuts, coarsely chopped, plus extra to serve
2 green chillies, de-seeded and roughly chopped
4 green finger chillies, 1 roughly chopped and 3 left whole
25g/1oz fresh ginger, peeled and roughly chopped
15g/½oz fresh turmeric, peeled and roughly chopped, or 1 tsp ground turmeric
4 large free-range eggs, at room temperature
rice or flatbreads (or both), to serve
300ml/10½fl oz vegetable stock, made with ½ stock cube

id: Lamb rendang with coriander and lime rice
ingredients: 3 cardamom pods, crushed and seeds removed
3 red chillies, seeds removed and chopped
1 thumb-sized piece of fresh root ginger, peeled and chopped
